overview:
Boston Technology Entrepreneur

Boston native and Global Head of Operations for Research Computing at Novartis Institutes for BioMedical Research in Cambridge, MA.

Cris runs Ultra Light Startups Boston organizing monthly panel discussions and networking events on topics related to the technology, marketing, design, and finance of online businesses. Since 2008, Ultra Light Startups has helped over 2,000 entrepreneurs build profitable online businesses.

To see upcoming events and sign up for the Ultra Light Startups weekly newsletter and social networking groups visit: http://ultralightstartups.com/

Primary expertise are in IT infrastructure in the Bio-IT sector as well as building communities and social media strategies. He obtained a BS in Business Administration from Suffolk University, and a MSc. in Computer Information Systems from Boston University.

Language Fluency: Italian, Spanish, English

Cris De Luca - www.crisdeluca.com Aurora De Luca Photography - www.auroradeluca.com Ultra Light Startups - www.ultralightstartups.com
